Rewards Rate: 5 RPs/₹200 Spent on Train Bookings and 2 RPs/₹200 Spent on Hotel/Flights/Cruise Bookings (All Bookings to be Made With IRCTC). 1 RP/₹200 Spent on Other Eligible Purchases
Reward Redemption: Redeem RPs at the IRCTC Website/Mobile App. 1 RP = ₹1
Travel: 2 Complimentary Railway Lounge Visits Each Quarter (8 Each Year)
Insurance Benefits: Insurance Cover for Train Cancellation Upto ₹5,000

fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the Cash Amount or a Minimum of ₹500

product_details: The IRCTC RBL Bank Credit Card offers 5 Reward Points/₹200 spent on train ticket bookings with IRCTC.
This is a co-branded credit card offered by RBL Bank and IRCTC.
Eight complimentary railway lounge accesses are available each year with this card.
Train cancellation cover upto ₹5,000 is offered along with the IRCTC RBL Credit Card.
Make quick and easy payments via UPI using the IRCTC RBL RuPay Credit Card.
